title: Ep. 225 - ENCORE! Bully by Penelope Douglas (Part 1)
itunes:title: Ep. 225 - ENCORE! Bully by Penelope Douglas (Part 1)
content:encoded:
Hey HBs! We're here with part 1 of Bully by Penelope Douglas. It's a new adult romance between middle-aged-sounding high schoolers who used to be best friends until he turned into a super villain and started bullying her. Listen, a lot of it didn't work for us, but the sexy times did. It was also an incredible vehicle for raceway noises, learning about arborists, and Melody climbing so high on an anti slut-shaming soap box that I doubt we'll ever see her again. If you want part 2, check out episode 88!

More Bonus Content: 

Erin's got attitude, Mel's got disclaimers, Cult housekeeping, book recs are NEVER a reflection on the person who recommended them, name opinions, Melody cannot let go of all the girl-on-girl crime, *Bing Boong Bong Bird Click* What Are Arborists? with Erin, vrooom vrooom beep beep! 

Self-Love Recommendations: 

Melody: Please, please, PLEASE donate to The Yellowhammer Fund to help our sisters in Alabama and The National Network of Abortion Funds to help our sisters all over the nation access basic medical care and take charge of their reproductive futures. 

Erin: ... Yasso Greek Yogurt Ice Cream Bars are super good! 

Make sure to check out Mel's new podcast Bonkers Romance! 

Subscribe! Rate! Review! Tell all your friends :)

Get more content on PATREON!!

Sign up for our Newsletter! 

MERCH! Teepublic, Chicaloo Kate, Redbubble

Make your life better and hire Natalie to assist you!!!

And follow our socials: 

Instagram: @heavingbosoms

Twitter: @heaving_bosoms

Mentioned in this episode:

Preorder Naima Simone X Friends Book Boyfriend Box!!

This box has EVERYTHING you could ever want in a book boyfriend from Tessa Bailey, Avery Flynn, Farrah Rochon, Jayci Lee, Kennedy Ryan, Adriana Herrera, and Naima Simone. You can look forward to paperbacks, signed book plates, limited edition book boyfriend mugs, the book boyfriend pajamas/loungewear, bookmarks and more! Tiers include: - Cinnamon Roll - $114.99 - The Alpha - - $169.99 Enter the promo code BONKERS10 at checkout to receive $10 off!!! ONLY AVAILABLE UNTIL OCT 10, 2022! If you have any questions, email orders@honeymagnolia.co.

Naima's Book Boyfriends
